Whoever has the key, has access
Anyone who knows these words can access your vault. Right now, you are the only person in the world who knows them.
All computational resources on Earth are not enough to break in. If you lose your key, it cannot be recovered. Store it somewhere safe ‚Äî in a password manager or written down on paper.
